1. About Sign In and Out 
 You can only sign in with your Gmail Account. If you want to sign out, please click the sign out button located on the User Home Page. 
 
 2. How to schedule a meeting 
 If you already decided a time for meeting: 
 Simply click the 'Quick Event' button located on the User Home Page and fill in the information. After finishing type in all the info, our app will lead you to the google calendar web page. All information you need to type in on the web page are already filled in for you. 
 
 If you are not sure about the meeting time: 
 Click the 'Manage Event' Button ---> Click the 'Create An New Event' Button ---> Fill in information ---> Let our app to find the available time for you to meet. Select a free time on the screen. Finally, you can go and create a meeting with your selected free time. 
 
 3. How to view my existing contacts 
 Click the 'Friends' button on the User Home page. 
 
 4. How to add an new contact: 
 After clicking the 'Friends' button in User Home, click the 'Add Friend' Button. 
 
 5. How to view my existing schedule: 
 Click the 'View Schedule' button on the User Home page.
